title: Tata Power Solar Systems partners with Bank of India for solar, EV charging station financing
description: Tata Power Solar Systems Ltd partnered with Bank of India to offer easy financing options for rooftop solar installations and EV charging stations. The collaboration aimed to support the government's green energy initiatives, offering loans with attractive interest rates and collateral-free options to residential users, housing societies, and MSMEs.
